General.Name: Real Estate Credit Investments Limited
General.Description: Real Estate Credit Investments Limited is a closed-ended fixed income mutual fund launched and managed by Cheyne Capital Management (UK) LLP. The fund invests in the fixed income markets across the globe. It primarily makes its investments in asset backed securities. The fund considers coupon or cash flows on the tranche relative to the underlying credit to make its investments. It was formerly known as Real Estate Credit Investments PCC Limited. Real Estate Credit Investments Limited was formed in September 6, 2005 and is domiciled in Guernsey, Channel Islands.
General.Address: Stornoway House, London, United Kingdom, SW1A 1HD
